message.msgstr: 您可以建立防火牆規則來保護您的網路避免Internet的病毒蠕蟲以及惡意攻擊。
預設原則 -- 未符合任何規則的封包將會被：
設定此系統的MAC/IP/Port過濾規則：

message.msgid: port filter current source port range
port filter current dest port range

message.msgstr: 您可以建立虛擬伺服器來提供網路服務。
目前系統的虛擬伺服器：
您可以建立一個隔離區來區分內部網路與Internet。
您可以設定內容過濾規則來限制不適當的網頁存取。

message.msgid: content filter webs content filter filter
content filter webs content filter apply
content filter webs content filter reset
content filter webs URL filter title
content filter webs url filter current
message.msgstr: 目前系統的網頁URL過濾規則：

message.msgid: content filter webs url fitler No
content filter webs url fitler url
content filter webs url fitler del
content filter webs url fitler reset
content filter webs url fitler add title
content filter webs url fitler add
content filter webs url fitler reset
content filter webs host fitler title
content filter webs host fitler current
message.msgstr: 目前系統的網頁主機過濾規則

message.msgid: content filter webs host fitler no
content filter webs host fitler host
content filter webs host fitler del
content filter webs host fitler reset
content filter webs host fitler add title
message.msgstr: 新增網頁主機過濾規則：

message.msgid: content filter webs host fitler keyword
content filter webs host fitler add
content filter webs host fitler reset

message.msgstr: 最多能設定規則數量為
您可以透過設定系統防火牆來保護路由器或無線存取點本身。
遠端管理 (經由廣域網路)

message.msgid: alert giving up:cannot create an xmlhttp instance
message.msgstr: Giving up :(Cannot create an XMLHTTP instance)

message.msgid: forward alert ip address format error
forward alert ip address is empty
forward alert it should be a 0 to 9 number
forward alert ip address range error
forward alert the rule number is exceeded
forward alert ip address is required
forward alert illegal characters are not allowable
forward alert the same rule has existed
port filter alert the rule number is exceeded
port filter alert please input any ip or/and port value
message.msgstr: 請輸入任何IP位址或連接埠範圍

message.msgid: port filter alert please fill the mac address in correct format
message.msgstr: 請填入MAC位址的正確格式 ! (XX:XX:XX:XX:XX:XX)

message.msgid: port filter alert invalid source port number: from
message.msgstr: 來源端連接埠範圍(SPR): 無效的開始連接埠號碼 !

message.msgid: port filter alert invalid source port number: to
message.msgstr: 來源端連接埠範圍(SPR): 無效的結束連接埠號碼 !

message.msgid: port filter alert invalid source port range setting
message.msgstr: 無效的來源端連接埠範圍(SPR) ! 開始連接埠號碼不能大於結束連接埠號碼

message.msgid: port filter alert invalid dest port number: from
message.msgstr: 目的端連接埠範圍(DPR): 無效的開始連接埠號碼 !

message.msgid: port filter alert invalid dest port number: to
message.msgstr: 目的端連接埠範圍(DPR): 無效的結束連接埠號碼 !

message.msgid: port filter alert invalid dest port range setting
message.msgstr: 無效的目的端連接埠範圍(DPR) ! 開始連接埠號碼不能大於結束連接埠號碼

message.msgid: port filter alert please input src or dest from port number
message.msgstr: 請輸入來源端或目的端的開始連接埠號碼

message.msgid: port filter alert source ip address format error
port filter alert dest ip address format error
port filter alert the same rule has existed
port filter alert illegal characters are not allowable
port filter alert the action of this rule would be the same with default policy
message.msgstr: 此規則與預設原則的執行動作相同 !

message.msgid: content filter alert please select the rule to be deleted
message.msgstr: 請選擇需要刪除的規則 !

message.msgid: content filter alert the maximum rule count is 32
content filter alert please enter a url filter
content filter alert please enter a valid url
content filter alert duplicated url string
content filter alert please enter a host filter
message.msgstr: 請輸入網頁主機過濾規則 !

message.msgid: content filter alert invalid host name
content filter alert duplicated host string
dmz alert not set a ip address
dmz alert ip address format error
dmz alert incorrect! ip address is lan ip
message.msgstr: 不正確! IP位址不能與區域網路的IP位址相同 !
